title: Patch 9
content:
t. Fixed a redcap with, suspiciously, the portrait of a goblin. Fixed NPC portraits not enlarging during their turn.

Torches no longer make cinematic scenes blindingly bright.* Beldron no longer loses his head after being freed. Connor no longer appears twice in his resurrection scene.* Laridda and Lunkbug now hold their pickaxes properly. Commander Zhalk's sword no longer blips out of existence.
